pages.text: 10|26|jin logon ne bhalaee kee, unake lie bhalaee hai aur kuchh badhakar bhee. aur na unake cheharon par kaalik lagee huee hogee aur na unhen zillat ka saamana hoga. yahee log jannatee hain ki usamen hamesha rahenge[1].

10|27|aur jin logon ne buraeeyaan keen, to buraee ka badala usee jaisa hoga; unapar apamaan chhaaya hoga aur unake lie allaah se bachaane vaala koee na hoga. unake mukhon par aise kaalima chhaayee hogee, jaise andheree raat ke kaale parde, unapar pade hue hon. vahee naarakee honge aur vahee usamen sadaavaasee honge.

10|28|jis din, ham unasab ko ekatr karenge, phir unase kahenge, jinhonne saajhee banaaya hai ki apane sthaan par ruke raho aur tumhaare (banaaye hue) saajhee bhee. phir ham unake beech alagaav kar denge aur unake saajhee kahengeh tumato hamaaree vandana hee nahin karate the.
10|29|hamaare aur tumhaare beech, allaah ka saakshy bas hai ki tumhaaree vandana se, ham asoochit the.
10|30|vaheen, pratyek vyakti use parakh lega, jo pahale kiya hai aur ve (nirnay ke lie) apane saty svaamee kee or pher diye jaayenge aur jo mithya baaten bana rahe the, unase kho jaayenge.

10|31|(he nabee!) unase poochhen ki tumhen kaun aakaash tatha dharatee[1] se jeevika pradaan karata hai? sunane tatha dekhane kee shaktiyaan kisake adhikaar mein hain? kaun nirjeev se jeev ko tatha jeev se nirjeev ko nikaalata hai? vah kaun hai, jo vishv kee vyavastha kar raha hai? ve kah denge ki allaah[2]! phir kaho ki kya tum (saty ke virodh se) darate nahin ho
10|32|to vahee allaah tumhaara saty paalanahaar hai, phir saty ke pashchaat kupath (asaty) ke siva kya rah gaya? phir tum kidhar phiraaye ja rahe ho
10|33|is prakaar, aapake paalanahaar kee baaten avagyaakaariyon par saty sidhd ho gayeen ki ve eemaan nahin laayenge.
